document.docAuthor: Marshall, Stephen A., Roháček, Jindřich, Dong, Hui & Buck, Matthias
document.masterDocTitle: The state of Sphaeroceridae (Diptera: Acalyptratae): a world catalog update covering the years 2000 - 2010, with new generic synonymy, new combinations, and new distributions

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The state of Sphaeroceridae (Diptera: Acalyptratae): a world catalog update covering the years 2000 - 2010, with new generic synonymy, new combinations, and new distributions

subSubSection.paragraph:
Paralimosina albipes Hayashi, 1994
. Distr.: Oriental: Malaysia , Nepal , Thailand .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paralimosina albipes
. –
HAYASHI (2008a) : 17
[new record from Thailand ];
Hayashi 2008b: 157
[new record from Malaysia ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Paralimosina altimontana (Roháček, 1977)
. Distr.: Oriental: Nepal , Pakistan , Thailand .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paralimosina altimontana
. –
HAYASHI (2008a) : 18
[new record from Thailand ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Paralimosina atrimarginata Hayashi, 2008
. Distr.: Oriental: Malaysia .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paralimosina atrimarginata Hayashi, 2008b: 157
[both sexes,illustr.]. Type locality: Malaysia , Pahang , Cameron Highlands, Tanaha Rata [ 1,400 m ]. HT male (NIID).

. Distr.: Oriental: Nepal , Thailand .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paralimosina bracteata
. –

[new record from Thailand ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Paralimosina choochotei Hayashi, 2008
. Distr.: Oriental: Thailand .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paralimosina choochotei Hayashi, 2008a: 19
[male only, illustr.]. Type locality: Thailand , Doi Inthanon, [ 1,150 m ]. HT male (NIID).

subSubSection.paragraph:

. Distr.: Oriental: Nepal , Thailand .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paralimosina confusa
. –

subSubSection.paragraph:
Paralimosina hamata Hayashi, 2008
. Distr.: Oriental: Malaysia .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paralimosina hamata Hayashi, 2008b: 159
[both sexes, illustr.]. Type locality: Malaysia , Pahang , Cameron Highlands, Tanaha Rata [ 1,400 m ]. HT male (NIID).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Paralimosina fucata (Rondani, 1880)
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Algeria , Andorra , Austria , Belgium , Bulgaria , Croatia , Czech Republic , Denmark , France (incl. Corsica ), Germany , Great Britain , Hungary , Iran , Italy , Latvia , Macedonia,? North Korea , Poland , Slovakia , Spain , Sweden , Switzerland , Tunisia .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paralimosina fucata
. –
GATT (2006b) : 190
–191 [anepisternum, male 5th sternite, illustr.].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Paralimosina kinabalensis Hayashi, 2007
. Distr.: Oriental: Malaysia (Borneo).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paralimosina kinabalensis Hayashi, 2007b: 221
[both sexes, illustr.]. Type locality: Malaysia , Sabah , Borneo, Mt Kinabalu, Paka, [ 3,080 m ]. HT male (SMJM).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Paralimosina longitricha Hayashi, 2008
. Distr.: Oriental: Malaysia , Thailand .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paralimosina longitricha Hayashi, 2008a:20
[male only, illustr.]. Type locality: Thailand , Doi Inthanon, 1,150 m . HT male (NIID). –
HAYASHI (2008b) : 161
[mid tibia illustr., new record from Malaysia ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Paralimosina maculipennis Hayashi, 2008
. Distr.: Oriental: Malaysia , Thailand .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paralimosina maculipennis Hayashi, 2008a: 22
[both sexes, illustr.]. Type locality: Thailand , Doi Inthanon, 1,700 m . HT male (NIID). –
HAYASHI (2008b) : 161
[male 6 th sternite illustr., new record from Malaysia ].

subSubSection.paragraph:

Paralimosina pallens Hayashi, 2008b: 162

subSubSection.paragraph:

. Distr.: Oriental: Thailand .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paralimosina persimilis Hayashi, 2008a: 24

subSubSection.paragraph:
Paralimosina subcribrata (Roháček, 1977)
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Austria , Czech Republic , France , Hungary , Italy , Montenegro , Romania , Slovakia , Spain , Sweden .

Paralimosina subcribrata
. – CARLES- TOLRÁ et al. (2006): 102 [new record from Spain ].

Paralimosina trichopyga (Richards, 1952)
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Austria , Czech Republic , France , Germany , Russia (SET), Slovakia , Switzerland .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paralimosina trichopyga
. –
KRIVOKHATSKY & NARTSHUK (2007) : 157
[new record from Russia (SET)].

subSubSection.paragraph:

. Distr.: Oriental: Thailand .
